name: Shink monetization
author: Shink

sections.description:
Use this plugin if you do not want manually change your theme templates in order to insert Full Page Script and/or Website Entry Script.

You will be able to configure following parameters:

  • set your Shink user ID
  • choose Shink domain
  • enable/disable Entry script
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

1. Navigate to the 'Add New' in the plugins dashboard
2. Search for 'shink-monetization'
3. Click 'Install Now'
4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard
5. Go to Admin -> Settings -> Shink web monetization Settings and enable the integration by checking the Integration Enabled checkbox
6. Follow the instructions on the screen in order to configure the plugin
7. Press Update Settings button

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard
1. Go to Admin -> Plugins -> Add New -> Upload and upload shink_monetization.zip
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3. Go to Admin -> Settings -> Shink web monetization Settings and enable the integration by checking the Integration Enabled checkbox
4. Follow the instructions on the screen in order to configure the plugin
5. Press Update Settings button

short_description: This is the official Shink plugin for Wordpress. It allows you to configure and use Full Page Script, Website Entry Script.
description:
Use this plugin if you do not want manually change your theme templates in order to insert Full Page Script and/or Website Entry Script.

You will be able to configure following parameters:

  • set your Shink user ID
  • choose Shink domain
  • enable/disable Entry script
